    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleJournalingMemSpace

        public SimpleJournalingMemSpace(MemDataSpace parent,
                                java.lang.Runnable flush,
                                int lgPageSize,
                                int maxDirtySpace,
                                long maxLogSize)
        Currently only parents with matching pageSize must be used. Otherwise: 1. Normal bound check fails 2. If we'd forse a parent to allow cross-boundary IO for last page, there would arise a possible inconsistency in allocate();
        Parameters:
        parent -
        flush -
        log -
        lgPageSize -
        maxDirtySpace -
        maxLogSize -
